metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48423 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 6.1.3, fs/ntfs3/record.c does not validateresident attribute names. An out-of-bounds write may occur.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
